```{r}
library(jeksterslabRmedsimple)
data(results_mvn_std_ci, package = "jeksterslabRmedsimple")
```

### Plots

#### alpha 0.05

```{r fig.height = 8.5, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.05)
plot_power(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.05)
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.05)
```

#### alpha 0.01

```{r fig.height = 8.5, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.01)
plot_power(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.01)
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.01)
```

#### alpha 0.001

```{r fig.height = 8.5, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.001)
plot_power(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.001)
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_ci, alpha_level = 0.001)
```
